cleaned_text: Description DesBio's Comprehensive Homeopathic Detox Kit temporarily relieves symptoms related to blockage of drainage pathways in the body. This complete protocol serves as the starting place for all other DesBio programs, including other forms of detoxification and our [Evolution Weight Management Program](http://desbio.com/?wpfb_dl=600).
